about_the_game:
Make Them Stop™ is a chaotic game where you must help your village grow while organizing protests across the country.



In a glorious past, the kingdom of Meritons shone with wisdom and prosperity. However, the weight of centuries has eroded the foundations of this dynasty, leaving its last heirs far from the brilliance of their ancestors. The governance of the kingdom has crumbled, injustices have multiplied, and many citizens have been forced to leave a system that has become unfair and outdated. Faced with this deadlock, you joined a handful of citizens abandoned by the system. Together, you embraced hope and decided to emancipate yourselves by establishing your own autonomous village.

It's not going to get done by itself!

You've landed in a camp populated by people abandoned by this ruthless system. To integrate, you'll need to lend a hand!



  • Help your comrades organize the camp: some will need assistance improving their shelters, help them produce the necessary resources, and turn the place into a haven of peace.
  • Participate in the various missions that will be offered to you: join your comrades on the most dangerous tasks, whether it's protests or clashes with the Meriton authorities - there's plenty to do!
  • Some will see your prosperity very negatively: the enemy can be anywhere, skilled in deception. You will need to stay vigilant and defend your community wisely.

Tomorrow there's a strike!

The goal? Attract media attention and get noticed by the general public.



  • Use tires and trash cans to slow the traffic and get noticed. Be sure to let emergency vehicles through or you'll lose the game!
  • Use pallets, combine them with other props, make banners, all you need is to make your cause visible.
  • Thugs will try to undermine your team's morale, you will be in charge of repairing the damage, don't let them discredit or weaken you.
  • The media will try to interact with you, avoid answering questions, even on strike, time is precious.
  • Because everything is easier with a good mood: maintain the conviviality of your team thanks to refreshment stands, music and sausages cooked on the grill!

If you think you're right for the job, you know what to do!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3210 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750(2GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon™ R7 260X (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6400 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM or Radeon™ RX 470(4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 compatible
  • Additional Notes: This configuration is recommended when hosting a multiplayer session.

short_description: This is the last straw! Abandoned by the system, you've moved to an autonomous village near the city, but to keep your place, you will have to contribute. Mobilize social movements to rally others to support your cause. Will you dare to make your voice heard?
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
